programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 3600

programme.title: UFO's in the News
programme.desc: From aircraft carriers to nuclear submarines, unidentified aerial phenomenon are being seen at alarming rates around the world. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Sounds of Cinespace
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Day Breaking News
programme.desc: From hotels to orbiting "reefs," the foundations for a burgeoning off-world economy are well underway. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel News- Starship to launch in Florida?
programme.desc: Billion Dollar Space rocks and Brownsville is still leading the charge in new space. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: Space Channel Nightside Edition News is a nightly news program that airs from 6pm to 8pm and covers the latest stories from the space community, from updates on the latest missions and spacecraft launches to interviews with industry leaders about the future of space exploration Duration: 7200

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: There are just some space movie trailers that are superior, satisfying and SICK!!!!! Here's a few of our favorites Duration: 3600

programme.title: UFO Conclusion
programme.desc: Can you handle the truth? A deep dive into the history and mystery of UFOs...uh we mean UAP's. Is the truth out there? You decided. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Join Walter Lloyd on a trip across the cosmos from the night-side of Earth. Duration: 14400

programme.title: AFTER DARK
programme.desc: If so, AFTER DARK is for you. Join Walter Lloyd on an intimate tour of the cosmos, right from your bed...at night. Duration: 14400
